alert.note: Alert for Apache Junction, Gold Canyon; Fountain Hills, East Mesa; Mazatzal Mountains; Pinal, Superstition Mountains; Rio Verde, Salt River; Tonto Basin (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 11 at 9:56PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Gila, Maricopa and Pinal Counties through 1045 PM MST... At 956 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Four Peaks, or 9 miles east of Sugarloaf Mountain, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Apache Junction, Fountain Hills, Round Valley, Sugarloaf Mountain, Ballantine Trailhead, Sunflower, Granite Reef Dam, Lost Dutchman State Park, Goldfield, Usery Mountain Park, Saguaro Lake, Canyon Lake, Goldfield Ranch, Four Peaks, Salt River Tubing Recreation Area, Rio Verde, Fort McDowell and Tortilla Flat. This includes the following highways... AZ Route 87 between mile markers 186 and 218. AZ Route 188 between mile markers 245 and 247. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Apache Junction, Gold Canyon; Fountain Hills, East Mesa; Mazatzal Mountains; Pinal, Superstition Mountains; Rio Verde, Salt River; Tonto Basin
